telephony_number_save_error: Oops, an error has occurred saving your number configuration.
telephony_number_feature_redirect_not_se: Please modify the redirection from the menu represented by "..." above.
telephony_number_feature_redirect_save_e: Oops! An error has occurred modifying the redirection.
telephony_number_feature_svi_url_record_: The destination where the record will be sent.
telephony_number_feature_svi_bad_url_for: The URL format is invalid. E.g. http://www.mydomain.com.
telephony_number_feature_svi_required_ur: The URL of the VXML configuration file is mandatory.
telephony_number_feature_svi_bad_url_ftp: The format of the FTP URL must be a directory (ended with a /). E.g. ftp://www.mydomain.com/myfolder/
telephony_number_feature_svi_bad_url_mai: The email address format is invalid. E.g. example@mydomain.com.
telephony_number_feature_svi_save_error: Oops! An error has occurred modifying your voice server settings.
